C

changeVolume(double[], double) - Static method in class MusicLibrary
This method scales the amplitude of the playable array (one that has been returned from sinstuff()) to change the volume.
clip(double[], double) - Static method in class MusicLibrary
This method replaces every value greater than a given threshold with that threshold.

E

echo(double[], double, int) - Static method in class MusicLibrary
This method repeats a tone based on a time interval and a number of repitions.

F

fadeIn(double[], int) - Static method in class MusicLibrary
This method scales the amplitude of the first given number of seconds of an array from 0 to the usual value.
fadeOut(double[], int) - Static method in class MusicLibrary
This method scales the amplitude of the last given number of seconds of an array from the usual value to 0.

H

harmonics(int, double) - Static method in class MusicLibrary
This method is used to turn a pitch into a double array, containing a harmonic with a given duration.

M

main(String[]) - Static method in class MusicLibrary
 
majorChord(int, double) - Static method in class MusicLibrary
This method is used to turn a pitch into a double array, containing a major chord with a given duration.
minorChord(int, double) - Static method in class MusicLibrary
This method is used to turn a pitch into a double array, containing a minor chord with a given duration.
MusicLibrary - Class in <Unnamed>
Array Tools
MusicLibrary() - Constructor for class MusicLibrary
 

S

sinstuff(double, double) - Static method in class MusicLibrary
This method is used to turn a frequency into a double array, containing a single note with a given duration.
sum(double[], double[], double, double) - Static method in class MusicLibrary
This method performs weighted addition on two sine waves arrays using the add method from the ArrayTools class.

T

trim(double[]) - Static method in class MusicLibrary
This method removes leading and trailing 0's from an array.
